snippet: A man acquitted of assaulting a priest he says molested him decades ago will not face another trial.
abstract: William Lynch, who was acquitted of assaulting Rev Jerold Lindner, will not face another trial; Lynch claims Lindner molested him decades ago.
lead_paragraph: A man acquitted of assaulting a priest he says molested him decades ago will not face another trial.

headline.main: California: Prosecutors Forgo New Trial for Man Accused of Assaulting Priest
headline.print_headline: California: Prosecutors Forgo New Trial For Man Accused of Assaulting Priest
